name: Counterhero Chapter 1
description:
The Red Crystals awaken special powers in their holders.

Some will be able to fly.

Some will gain control over fire.

Some will even cease aging...

You have come from 2000 years in  the future to find these mysterious stones.

What ability will they grant you?

Counterhero is an RPG with roguelike and puzzle elements. In Chapter 1, the objective is to defeat the dreaded Monster by gaining EXP, finding weapons, and talking to villagers. Throughout the game, you'll also come across Red Crystals which will introduce a radical new game mechanic.

Proceeds from game purchases will be used to continue development and add more chapters. Any and all support is appreciated!
